item.title: New theme ðŸ˜Ž
item.description: After tinkering and messing up inside Hugo, I changed some things up in this theme! Next up is to implement some widgets to make my life easier..

item.title: Customizing
item.description: Customizing this site is kinda hard. The original theme is kind of minimalist which is good if I want to add features but at the same time I want other features from other themes too. I’ve been referencing other themes to modify this theme. Hugo is a pain in the butt. I’ve been trying to learn Go but it’s going to be taking a while… In the mean time to test image uploading, here’s a cat.
